name: How to Stay Organized
description:
Set yourself on the right path!

Made for

https://itch.io/jam/random-wikihow-jam

Theme I got

https://www.wikihow.com/Stay-Organized

The most I got out of this jam was that I finally wrote my interactive story engine which was on a waiting list for a while. It still lacks in features and animated transitions and such, but I am comfortable with using it even though at present state this includes writing lots of code in JS.

The game is nothing amazing, it is more of a showcase for the engine, making of which took most of my time. Some might find it entertaining but I can't make any promises.
